title: CA releases commemorative postage stamp on Victory Day
body: He also unveiled an opening day cover and canceller at the State Guest House Jamuna Chief Adviser Professor Muhammad Yunus on Monday released a commemorative postage stamp on the occasion of the Great Victory Day. He also released an opening day cover and a canceller at a ceremony at the State Guest House Jamuna here on Monday afternoon, said the Chief Adviser’s Press Wing. Special Assistant to the Chief Adviser for Posts, Telecommunications and Information Technology, Faiz Ahmad Taiyeb, Information and Communication Technology (ICT) Division Secretary Shish Haider Chowdhury, Posts and Telecommunications Division Secretary Abdun Naser Khan and Director General of the Directorate of Posts SM Shahab Uddin were present on the occasion.
